source: LOIS AI sidebar on Drabo v. Homesite intake page

cases.name: Drabo, James v. Homesite
cases.notes: Homesite initially denied claim May 2025. Later covered roof replacement for dwelling and detached garage. Not covering gutters, downspouts, soffit repair, kitchen ceiling damage citing cosmetic exclusions.

cases.name: Abernathy v. State Farm
cases.notes: Federal case. Settlement offer $125k sent 9/8/2025, expired 10/3/2025. Client bottom line $75k. Discovery ongoing.

cases.name: Simard v. USAA
cases.notes: Water line broke in NW corner of basement. USAA denied. Lawsuit filed 8/21/2024. Trial set April 14-17, 2026. USAA filed Motion for Partial Summary Judgment on statute of limitations.

cases.name: Dorsett v. USAA
cases.notes: Client wanted $1M, attorney discussed $850k range. Expenses: Williams Investigation $75, E-Filing $126.

cases.name: Duncan, Erick v. Westfield Insurance
cases.notes: Bad faith evidence: adjuster denied wind damage despite audio recording proving otherwise. Discovery served 8/12/2025.

cases.name: Tedesco, Matthew and Jan v. State Farm and Old Republic
cases.notes: GE appliance warranty issue. Client contacted agent Jon Miller from 2/13/2024. Formal claim opened 4/5/2024.

cases.name: Wielawski v. State Farm
cases.notes: Claim under $75k. Motion to remand to state court. Client reports accumulating damages from delayed repairs.

cases.name: Hanbali v. [Insurer]
cases.notes: Settlement check mailed 2/4/2026. Arnold Roofing A/A/O.

cases.name: Heritage Place Property Owners Assoc. v. State Farm
cases.insurer: State Farm Fire and Casualty Company
cases.notes: HOA case. Wohlscheid Civil Engineering confirmed hail as proximate cause. Multiple units with post-storm leaks.

cases.name: Church of God Prophecy v. Brotherhood Mutual
cases.notes: Counter at $117,587.48 sent 12/15/2025. Brotherhood reviewing. Sean Aiello substituted as counsel.

cases.name: Peel, William Greg v. Tennessee Farmers Mutual
cases.notes: TN Farmers filed frivolous counterclaim. Sanction request filed. Campbell & Campbell representing defense.

cases.name: Jensen, Erin v. Foremost
cases.notes: Adjuster Shane Gamradt discussing client claim with other clients. Bad faith evidence. Client works for Farmers Insurance, threatened termination.

cases.name: Cates, Patricia v. Kentucky Farm Bureau
cases.notes: Proof of loss signed 11/4/2025. Demand sent same day. Farm Bureau denied wind/hail damage, offered engineer inspection.

cases.name: Everett Crossing HOA v. QBE Insurance
cases.notes: HOA case. Adjuster Zach Murray from QBE.

cases.name: Rooks v. Kentucky Housing Corp.
cases.notes: Settlement complete. Client paid, bonus disbursed. Christopher seeking approval to close file.

cases.name: Lee, Christina v. National General
cases.notes: Total loss fire claim. Martin Lee is first responder. Family displaced. NGIC paid nothing despite EUOs completed. Final demand sent 11/20/2025.

cases.name: Harper, Teresa v. American Bankers
cases.notes: Denial letter dated 9/5/2024.

cases.name: Lake Village at Landis Lake v. Erie
cases.notes: 19 properties. EFI Global expert Kyle Meehan for defense. Subpoena for documents served.

cases.name: Hart, Ian and Kelsi v. State Farm
cases.notes: State Farm never inspected property despite claim filed 7/4/2024. Noble Public Adjusting estimate $103,716.87.

cases.name: Homeowners of Pinecrest Townhomes v. Grange Insurance
cases.notes: Discovery dispute about proof of loss.

cases.name: Wright, Penny v. Allstate
cases.notes: Prior eviction lawsuit with Mark and Ashley Ellis.

cases.name: Mayberry Street Church of Christ v. State Farm
cases.insurer: State Farm Fire and Casualty Company
cases.notes: Defense: Daniel C. Headrick and Matthew J. Evans, Knoxville.

cases.name: Rajendran, Bryson
cases.notes: Tree damage case. Multiple defendants: Eastside Revitalization I, II, III L.P.

cases.name: Arnold Roofing A/A/O Wenwood Towns Association v. State Farm
cases.court: District of South Carolina, Greenville Division
cases.notes: Arnold Roofing assignee. 75/25 fee split with local counsel William B. Jung. Buildings 500,600,800,1200,1500 roofs replaced.

cases.name: Richmond, Roy v. Farmers Insurance
cases.notes: Farmers denied claim saying no hail damage. 8 neighbors got new roofs from same storm. Public adjuster Alexis Morrissette from Victory Claims Services.

cases.name: Verstreet v. Tennessee Farm Bureau
cases.propertyAddress: 111 Second Ave E, Mount Pleasant, TN 38474
cases.notes: TN Farm Bureau denied claim alleging misrepresentation. Concerns about EUO bankruptcy disclosures and contents inventory.

cases.name: MHF&O LLC v. Encova Insurance
cases.notes: Referenced in LOIS sidebar

cases.name: Stiles v. Rock Ridge/American Reliable
cases.insurer: Rock Ridge Insurance / American Reliable Insurance
cases.notes: Farm properties - North Cleveland Road and Hunterstown Road. Run-in sheds damaged. Adjuster Traci Anderson closed claims before estimates obtained.
